column3: School of Community Health and Midwifery
column5: Seize a valuable opportunity to share knowledge in a multi-professional forum as you work towards an MSc in Community Health Practice. Tailor your studies to your personal and professional interests while reflecting on the place that your clinical practice occupies in relation to other community health disciplines.A blended learning approach allows you to select from a range of modules studied on campus or via eLearn.You’ll explore, develop and enhance your clinical practice, synthesising your professional expertise in relation to other disciplines contributing to community healthcare.
